features: Impossibly slick formula fights nicks, irritation and razor burn
Gives you a close, comfortable shave
Cooling formula contains peppermint and menthol to cool and invigorate your skin
90-day supply, which lasts longer than average shave cream/gel

Rich and concentrated cream made with high quality ingredients including Macadamia Seed Oil, Aloe, Calendula Extract, Lemon Extract, Papaya Extract, and Olive Leaf Extract. Paraben Free. Not tested on animals
body.description: Our shave creams are made of super-slick molecules that provide a slippery interface between sharp blade and sensitive skin; you'll enjoy an effortlessly close shave while fighting razor burn and skin irritation. Each Cremo Shave Cream is formulated to make your grooming ritual quick, reliable and even enjoyable. Inspired by the latest insights of cosmetic science and a deep respect for tradition, Cremo promises no gimmicks and no fluff. That's the difference between shave cream and shave cream with soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Astonishing performance, superior ingredients and dramatic results. Just think of a barbershop and the people who work there. There's pride, professionalism and passion That's the feeling we've captured in every Barber Grade Product. Products we've created with astonishingly high standards - to meet your standards. Not the easy way. Not the cheapest way. The Cremo way. Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream Cooling Formula Refreshing Mint Scent Fight Razor Burn Are you tired of the razor burn that comes with shaving? We were too. That's why we created Cremo Shave Cream. It's uniquely formulated to give you a close, comfortable shave without the burn, no matter what type of razor you use. How? With its rich, concentrated formula that's packed with ultra-slick molecules so almost any blade can glide effortlessly over your skin. You get a close, comfortable shave, every time. Gives you a close, comfortable shave Impossibly slick formula Leaves skin astonishingly smooth Cooling Formula, Refreshing Mint Scent

Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream A close shave with virtually any blade Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream creates an ultra-slick surface so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin. No matter what kind of blade you use. Fights nicks, razor burn and skin irritation Cremo is an exceptional shave cream. Why? Many shave creams and gels are filled with air. Not exactly the best lubricant. Cremo is concentrated with unique molecules that become impossibly slick when mixed with water. You'll enjoy a clean, comfortable shave and astonishingly smooth skin while fighting nicks, razor burn and irritation. Variety of uncommon scents From refreshing Silver Water & Birch to the energizing blend of Sage & Citrus, Cremo's great-smelling scents make a comfortable and enjoyable shave experience even better.

Original Formula Classic Cooling Formula Refreshing Mint Original Formula Sandalwood Original Formula Sage & Citrus Original Formula Silver Water & Birch Original Formula Reserve Blend Scent Subtle citrus Peppermint, menthol, tea tree Woodsy, masculine Invigorating sage and citrus Clean, sophisticated, fresh Sophisticated, masculine scent Fights nicks and razor burn ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Available sizes 1 oz, 3 oz, 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz 6 oz Works with virtually any blade ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this on my face and I shave my scalp with this and it feels great. The minty scent is not overpowering, but it gives it nice cooling tingle. The quality is wonderful and I get a close shave every time I use it. I can’t recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the only kind my husband wants me to use on his sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: My husband shaves his head 2x a week. Will only use this product. He like the coolness of it. It lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband said this was his favorite Christmas gift. I love how it smells. It's not too strong but it's super fresh and minty. He said it works nicely for shaving his face and loves it.

reviews.reviewText: I paid a bit more for this product than i would have liked, BUT - when it arrived I was very pleased with it's quality and effectiveness as a shaving aid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like this cream a lot. Fresh smelling and a little goes a long way. Last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I use this to shave my head and it provides great moisturization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shave in over 60 years of shaving
reviews.reviewText: Both regular and coolng Cremo shave creams give a moist creamy surface for you razor to glide over. I use the cooling version because I like the extra feeling of cool clean skin. I've been using Cremo for the past 5 years, so this isn't a first impression--it is my only shave cream. Because it is non aerosol it is great for traveling. When flying, I simply squeeze out the Cremo into an approved TSA container.

reviews.reviewTitle: Encantado con la fragancia y la sensación!
reviews.reviewText: Lo primero que noté al abrir por primera vez es su aroma refrescante, la menta se siente bastante presente pero al terminar el rasurado se disipa en unos minutos así que no es molesto.La lubricación al rasurado depende mucho de la cantidad de agua, esta debe ser la correcta, pues muy poca hace que la navaja no resbale bien y mucha agua hace que este se disuelva bastante, pero no es dificil de dar con la mezcla correcta. Despues de dar la primer pasada, usualmente es suficiente solo añadir más agua con las manos para reactivar para la segunda lo cual ahorra tiempo y producto.La frescura que deja en la piel (y lo increiblemente suave que la deja!) es genial. Deja una sensación de limpieza y comodidad en la cara, he notado que no es tan necesario el uso de un aftershave al usar Cremo ya que deja mi piel bastante bien y no irritada, ya que mi piel, principalmente el el bigote es bastante sensible.Definitivamente volveré a adquirir este producto, posiblemente en otras fragancias, aunque este par de tubos me durará bastante tiempo ya que un poco sirve para mucho (posiblemente con el tamaño de dos monedas de $1 cubriría toda mi cara incluyendo la barba hasta el cuello.

Buen producto, no deja enrojecimiento en la piel aun usando una razuradora clásica (solo necesitas la técnica y la paciente para ello). Apenas terminé el primer tubo, utilizas muy poco para rasurar la barba.

I decided to try this shaving cream after reading the reviews and I DID NOT regret it. I have been using Kiehl's Ultimate Brushless Shave Cream - White Eagle for many many years to shave my head and face but still was not 100% satisfied as I had to use quite a lot of product to achieve the desired clean shave, and I would still have problems shaving against the growth. Also it clogs up my razor and made it dull very quick, and its much more expensive ($18 for 5oz)Creemo shaves like a dream and I only used 1/2 (or less) than I previously used with Kiehl's. It does not clog up my blades which made them much easier to clean and last for a longer time. I also had very minimal razor burn and nicks, even with shaving against the growth. Not to mention I bought them for about $11.50 FOR 2 6oz TUBES!!!!Cheaper, last longer and does what it says. Am looking forward to trying the original and other fragrances. 10/10 Would repurchase and highly recommend!!

Let me get straight to the points:Pros -* Attractive packaging (really cool actually)* Stands up, in the bottle, on its own* Smells fantastic* Great marketing claims and designBuuuuuut, what's that got to do with shaving?Cons - This is going to take some explaining.At first I didn't read the instructions and I put enough gel in my hand to immulate a mound of normal shave lotion. I had the worst time trying to get a shave. The cream clogged up my razor so bad it took me about 5-minutes to jet-wash it from between the blade. i should have just thrown away the blade.So, because it was my bad I decided to give it another try. This time paying attention to the instructions that say to only put an almond-size squirt and use water to mix. Unfortunately, I had the same results...just lessor than before.With all the design and hype I feel the product missed on the essentials. The cream should never clog the blade and razor whereby rinsing alone does not dislodge the gunk.
Fue una muy buena compra, no tienes que usar mucha y la sensacion que deja despues del rasurado es muy agradable.
